wordSelection.title: Long Press Words
wordSelection.description: Long press on an English word to look up its meaning and add it to your vocabulary.

bookSearch.title: Look Up Posts
bookSearch.description: Tap the book icon to translate and analyze the entire post.

tips.title: Usage Tips
tips.description: Tap the lightbulb icon to view usage tips anytime.

apiSetup.title: Enable Translation
apiSetup.description: Register a DeepL API Key in Settings to enable Japanese translation. It's free to start!
